fields.name: LOL
fields.sys_min:
2 GHz single core processor
1 GB of RAM (2GB for Windows Vista or newer)
8 GB of hard drive space
Graphics card that supports DirectX 9.0c or above and shader version 2.0

2 GB of RAM (4 GB for Windows Vista or newer)
12 GB available hard disk space
Graphics card with 512MB or higher VRAM and supports DirectX 9.0c

fields.name: Witcher 2
fields.sys_min:
OS: Windows XP SP2 / Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7 (32/64-bit)
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 Ghz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+
Memory: 1 GB Windows XP / 2 GB Windows Vista and Windows 7
Video Card: 512 MB RAM, supporting Pixel Shader 3.0 (NVIDIA GeForce 8800)
Sound Card: compatible with DirectX 9.0c
HDD: 16 GB of disc space
Disc Drive: DVD x8, compatible with DVD9

Memory: 3 GB Windows XP / 4 GB Windows Vista and Windows 7

Disc Drive: DVD x8, compatible with DVD9
